Joining @HouseDemocrats calling on GOP to #DoTheRightThing. Extend the middle class tax cuts now #fiscalcliff #ncpol
2) sensible approach to revenue. Pres. Obama has already proposed a sensible plan: Let the Bush tax breaks expire on income over $250,000/yr
We've done it before. In the 90s the formula was 1) fiscal discipline on all fronts focusing limited $ on recovery & investing in our future
A common sense approach to sequestration & the fiscal cliff that accelerates the recovery & restores fiscal health isn't hard to imagine.
In fact, the same argument applies equally to domestic investments in education, infrastructure, research and innovation.
With sequestration looming, GOP says  defense spending creates jobs and cutting it means fewer jobs...Now they're "Defense Keynesians"?
